document_data.name: Varce Humbletood
document_data.mainbody:
'''Varce Humbletood''' was an inhabitant of the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|''Please stop distracting me, I might miss the call for my appointment!''|Varce Humbletood}}
document_data.Description: Varce was a [[human]] with light skin tone, aquamarine eyes, and light brown hair.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Varce Humbletood was a customer of the [[Facemaker Fashion]] boutique. On the day the shop's proprietor was attacked by the [[Bhaalist]] assassins, Varce impatiently waited for his hair appointment in a queue outside of the shop.
